title: Dr. Russell Moore on Batman & Superman Mythology
description:
Theologian and Ethicist, Dr. Russell Moore joins me for a conversation about our American mythology. In particular, the hero myths of Batman and Superman and the symbolic values that these characters and their narrative arcs represent. 
#Batman #Superman #BatmanTheology #SupermanTheology #HeroMyths

To listen to the entire conversation on the Deep Talks podcast visit:
https://www.podbean.com/eu/pb-8jy3g-ed64d9

To Support the Channel and Podcast on Patreon visit:
https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast
